text: Oh nina enikholwayo! Ningenzi ukuphana kwenu kube yize ngokukhuluma ngako, nangokulimaza njengalowo osebenzisa ingcebo yakhe ukuze abukwe ngabantu futhi engakholelwa kuMvelinqangi nososukwini lokugcina. Isibonelo sakhe sinjengesedwala elibushelelezi okunenhlabathi phezulu kwalo, bese imvula enkulu inela kulona bese lisala lingenalutho abakwazi (ukugcina) okuthize kulokho abakuvunile futhi uMvelinqangi akabaholi abantu abangakholwa
